definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I did. There was a blue flash and the set caught alight .
sentences.chinese: 我一打开，蓝光一闪，机子就烧了。

sentences.english: He stopped the machine and replayed the message.
sentences.chinese: 他关掉机子，重新放了一遍留言。

sentences.english: I agree that the iPad is heavy.
sentences.chinese: 这机子比较沉，这我同意。

sentences.english: Turns out I threw the brand new one I just bought an hour earlier.
sentences.chinese: 实际上我扔出去的是我一小时前刚买的正版机子。

sentences.english: This results in increased integration and lower system cost.
sentences.chinese: 这大大地提高了机子的集成度，降低了生产成本价格。

sentences.english: With these machines, Dell is making a strong bid to win back consumers' hearts.
sentences.chinese: 戴尔在这两款机子上押了大宝，誓要赢回消费者的心。

sentences.english: Black-hearted boss, ah, the machine tune too dead, two extensions can be input into this.
sentences.chinese: 老板黑心啊，机子调得太死了，两分机都能输成这样。

definition: to dismantle a machine/to terminate a telephone service
see 單反相機|单反相机[dan1 fan3 xiang4 ji1]
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
